html:
roaring like a lion/young lions. Those who gather to Zion, or embrace the gospel, will be as fearsome, mighty, and majestic as a great lion in its strength. The lesser animals (or enemies of the righteous) will not impede the Saints' desire to return there (3 Ne. 21:12-13).

lay hold of the prey. No enemy will be able to stand against the righteous in latter-day Israel.
